languages.text: {n}Спустя пару минут картинных вздохов Абеляр прочищает горло.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, я вам не верю".
{n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя пару минут картинных вздохов Абеляр прочищает горло.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, я вам не верю".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a couple of minutes of theatrical sighing, Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a couple of minutes of theatrical sighing, Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après avoir écouté vos soupirs exagérés pendant quelques instants, Abélard vous interrompt en se raclant la gorge.{/n} « Ce n'est pas très convaincant, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir écouté vos soupirs exagérés pendant quelques instants, Abélard vous interrompt en se raclant la gorge.{/n} « Ce n'est pas très convaincant, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras unos minutos de suspiros teatrales, Abelard te interrumpe con una tosecita.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, no me lo creo».
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras unos minutos de suspiros teatrales, Abelard te interrumpe con una tosecita.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, no me lo creo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}你夸张地长吁短叹几分钟之后，阿贝拉德轻轻咳嗽了一声，打断了你。{/n}“大人，您的演技太浮夸了。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}你夸张地长吁短叹几分钟之后，阿贝拉德轻轻咳嗽了一声，打断了你。{/n}“大人，您的演技太浮夸了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}芝居がかったため息が数分続いた後、アベラルドは小さく咳払いをしてあなたを遮った。{/n}「陛下、あなたを信用できません」
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}芝居がかったため息が数分続いた後、アベラルドは小さく咳払いをしてあなたを遮った。{/n}「陛下、あなたを信用できません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen Minuten deines theatralischen Seufzens unterbricht Abelard dich mit einem kleinen Husten.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich glaube Euch nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen Minuten deines theatralischen Seufzens unterbricht Abelard dich mit einem kleinen Husten.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich glaube Euch nicht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Birkaç dakika süren teatral iç çekmelerinin ardından Abelard, küçük bir öksürükle araya giriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, beni kandıramadınız."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few minutes of your theatrical sighing, Abelard interrupts you with a small cough.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not believe you."
